T02D2640:243b-1: pradzny'a p'a ra mi ta hri da ya sv'a dha nam /
T02D2640:243b-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2640:243b-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dus gsum
T02D2640:243b-5: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D2640:243b-6: // dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi gzhi yin lam yin 'bras bu'ang de //
T02D2640:243b-7: shes rab mi dmigs shes rab snying po gtso bo dbyer med pa //
T02D2640:243b-8: sku gsum dkon mchog gsum la dbyer med lus ngag yid btud nas //
T02D2640:243b-9: rgyal yum rim brgyud dad dang shes rab thob phyir bri //
T02D2640:243b-10: dad dang shes rab sngon 'gro skyabs dang sems bskyed cing //
T02D2640:243b-11: brtson pas grol 'dod bzod ldan sdug bsngal med spangs nas //
T02D2640:243b-12: 'jig rten chos brgyad bsam btang nas ni ma nyams te //
T02D2640:243b-13: 'dod yon ma chags khrims ldan ci 'byor mchod dang sbyin //
T02D2640:243b-14: shes rab sbyangs pas shes rab don shes shes rab spyod 'dod pas //
T02D2640:243b-15: rgyal ba'i gnas dang chos 'di gnas su shes rab snying po sgrub //
T02D2640:243b-16: gang la chags phyin drug ldan pas khrus byas la //
T02D2640:243b-17: rten la mandala mchod bshams stan la mnyam 'dug ste //
T02D2640:244a-0: bdun brgya pa yi sngags brjod @244a * //
T02D2640:244a-2: rten der phun sum tshogs pa sngar bsags spyan der drang //
T02D2640:244a-3: shes rab pha rol phyin thob shes rab pha rol phyin //
T02D2640:244a-4: thabs mang gdul bya 'dul ba'i chos rnam pha rol phyin //
T02D2640:244a-5: rgyal ba'i yum gyur rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la //
T02D2640:244a-6: bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum dang gus deng nas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2640:244a-7: 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan gyi 'jig rten na //
T02D2640:244a-8: mchod par 'os pa'i gzugs sgra dri dag dang //
T02D2640:244a-9: ro dang reg bya thugs dang mi 'gal ba'i //
T02D2640:244a-10: gtsang dang ma nyams dman par ma gyur pa'i //
T02D2640:244a-11: chu gtsang bsil dang me tog khyad par can //
T02D2640:244a-12: dbyibs legs dri zhim kha dog sna tshogs mdzes //
T02D2640:244a-13: tsandan gur kum ga pur la sogs sbyar //
T02D2640:244a-14: so sor bsreg pa'i bdug pa ji snyed dang //
T02D2640:244a-15: nyi zla ltar gsal rin chen 'od 'bar ba'i //
T02D2640:244a-16: rin chen sgrol ma mar me mdzes pa'i 'od //
T02D2640:244a-17: gla rtsi tsandan tu ruska sogs legs sbyar dri //
T02D2640:244a-18: sku mdzes don du byi dor byug pa rdzas rnams dang //
T02D2640:244a-19: sman dang 'bras chan shing thog tam po le //
T02D2640:244a-20: yun ring 'tsho ba rnams kyang rim par dbul //
T02D2640:244a-21: sgra snyan dbyangs dang sil snyan rol mor bcas //
T02D2640:244a-22: rin chen bdun dang rin chen gzhan rnams dang //
T02D2640:244a-23: bkra shis rdzas brgyad gzhan yang bkra shis rdzas //
T02D2640:244a-24: bdag gi lus ngag yid bcas khyod la dbul //
T02D2640:244a-25: rgyal sras thugs rje can gyis bdag gzigs la //
T02D2640:244a-26: 'gro gzugs bde bar bya phyir bzhes su gsol //
T02D2640:244a-27: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta /
T02D2640:244a-28: zhes de nyid bsdus pa'i sngags kyis dbul /
T02D2640:244a-29: rgyal ba sras dang bcas la bdag re gnong //
T02D2640:244a-30: 'khor bar ma rig lus ngag yid gsum gyis //
T02D2640:244a-31: mtshams med la sogs sdig pa'i las bgyis dang //
T02D2640:244a-32: bgyid du stsal dang rjes su yi rang bshags //
T02D2640:244a-33: da ni 'jigs so rgyal sras khyed dpang las //
T02D2640:244a-34: lus ngag yid sdig slan chad mi bgyid do //
T02D2640:244a-35: rgyal sras khyed dang 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag na //
T02D2640:244a-36: 'gro rigs dge ba theg pa rim gyis spyod byed pa'i //
T02D2640:244a-37: rgyu 'bras ma 'dres so so'i dge ba bdag yi rang //
T02D2640:244a-38: yi rang dge de zag med 'gro la so sor bsngo //
T02D2640:244a-39: kun gyi skyabs chen rgyal sras skyabs dgal //
T02D2640:244b-0: deng nas bzung @244b ste bdag bskyab skyob par mdzod //
T02D2640:244b-1: skyabs gnas khyed ltar bdag kyang sems bskyed pas //
T02D2640:244b-2: khyod kyis spyod ltar bdag spyod 'gro ba'i don byed
T02D2640:244b-3: shog / rgyal sras khyod kyis sna tshogs sku sprul
T02D2640:244b-4: la // 'gro ba grol ba'i rim par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02D2640:244b-5: 'gro ba so sor bde lam byang chub ma thob par //
T02D2640:244b-6: rgyal ba sras bcas mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol //
T02D2640:244b-7: phyag 'tshal mchod sogs byas pa'i dge ba rgya chen de //
T02D2640:244b-8: 'gro la bsngos pas 'gro ba so sor bde ba dang //
T02D2640:244b-9: ma grol grol dang ma bsgal bsgral dang dbugs phyin dang //
T02D2640:244b-10: mya ngan ma 'das pa dag mya ngan 'da' bar
T02D2640:244b-11: shog / rgyal sras dbang por rgyal sras lta bur
T02D2640:244b-12: bdag gis ni // tshad med bzhi bsgom rgyal ba sras bcas gnas su gshegs su gsol //
T02D2640:244b-13: shes rab pha rol phyin shes dngos po rnams stong pas //
T02D2640:244b-14: sva bh'a'i sngags kyis stong par bzlas pas dngos stong dang //
T02D2640:244b-15: sh'u n+ya t'a brjod gzung ba nyid dang bral //
T02D2640:244b-16: 'dzin med gnas pa med par blo mnyam gzhag / mnyam pa'i ngang las ri rgyal dmigs byas la //
T02D2640:244b-17: de las rim gyis byung bas gling rnams chags //
T02D2640:244b-18: ri steng pam pad aa las zla ba dang //
T02D2640:244b-19: seng ge'i khri la rin po che yi khri //
T02D2640:244b-20: rin chen yon tan rgyan rnams legs gsal nas //
T02D2640:244b-21: khri steng padma sna tshogs lte ba la //
T02D2640:244b-23: 'og tu zla ba a'a li las //
T02D2640:244b-24: steng du k'a li nyi ma grub //
T02D2640:244b-26: lte bar zla ba mam gnas pa //
T02D2640:244b-27: thams cad gcig gyur bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2640:244b-28: shar du pam las yum nyid bzhengs //
T02D2640:244b-29: lho ru h'um las phyag rdo rje //
T02D2640:244b-30: nub tu mam las sh'a ri'i bu //
T02D2640:244b-31: byang du hr'i: las spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2640:244b-32: bcom ldan gser mdog chos 'chad phyag / rdo rje skyil krung gtsug tor bcas //
T02D2640:244b-33: spyan yangs mthing ga mjod [*mdzod?] spur ldan //
T02D2640:244b-35: yum ni longs spyod rgyan can te //
T02D2640:244b-36: gser mdog sku ni shin tu rgyas //
T02D2640:244b-37: pad zla rgyas pa'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D2640:244b-38: phyag gnyis mnyam pa'i ting 'dzin gzhag / g-yas pa chos 'chad pa dang ldan //
T02D2640:244b-40: phyag na rdo rje zhal gcig pa //
T02D2640:244b-41: sngon po g-yas na rdo rje bsam //
T02D2640:245a-1: rin chen rgyan ldan skyil krung bcas //
T02D2640:245a-2: sh'a ri ser po dka' thub gzugs //
T02D2640:245a-3: chos gos gsum dang gsil byed g-yas //
T02D2640:245a-4: pus btsugs g-yon na lhung bzed thogs //
T02D2640:245a-5: lus ngag bsdams nas gnas pa'o //
T02D2640:245a-6: mgon po byang sems spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2640:245a-7: rgyan mdzes sems dpa'i skyil mo krung //
T02D2640:245a-8: g-yas na padma mchog sbyin dang //
T02D2640:245a-10: de rnams zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D2640:245a-11: gsal bar gyur nas phyogs kun du //
T02D2640:245a-12: byang chub sems dang nyan thos gzugs //
T02D2640:245a-14: / steng 'og phyogs rnams thams cad du //
T02D2640:245a-15: rang rang mdog dang mtshan mas bskyed //
T02D2640:245a-16: de nas bdag po'i mig sogs la //
T02D2640:245a-17: ksham dzam kham gam skam sam rnams //
T02D2640:245a-18: zla ba padma gdan spro bsdu //
T02D2640:245a-19: de nyid gsum yang gnas gsum du //
T02D2640:245a-20: sbro [*spro] bsdu mtshan ma gsum du bsgom //
T02D2640:245a-21: ye shes gzhug dang dbang bskur dang //
T02D2640:245a-22: mi bskyod la sogs so sor gzhag / sh'a ri'i spyi bor rgyal ba nyid //
T02D2640:245a-23: gsang dbang spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2640:245a-24: mgon la 'od dpag yum nyid la //
T02D2640:245a-25: mi bskyod gnas la mchod pa dbul //
T02D2640:245a-26: 'o thug spro bsdu mdun gyi yum //
T02D2640:245a-27: bdag la bsdus la snying po'i don //
T02D2640:245a-29: thams cad bdag gis gsal bsgoms la //
T02D2640:245a-30: spyan ras gzigs dang der sems la //
T02D2640:245a-31: sh'a ris zhus dang ldan btab pa'i //
T02D2640:245a-32: mdo don skabs shes don dam bsgom //
T02D2640:245a-33: skyo na bden pa'i ngag 'don ta //
T02D2640:245a-34: tadya th'a dang aom spel nas //
T02D2640:245a-35: ga te ga te p'a ra dang //
T02D2640:245a-36: ga te p'a ra sam ga te //
T02D2640:245a-37: bo dhi sv'a h'a zhes brjod la //
T02D2640:245a-38: snying gar padma'i lte ba la //
T02D2640:245a-39: mam ser bdag la g-yas skor bgrang //
T02D2640:245a-41: bdag nyid yi ge mam la bsdu //
T02D2640:245a-42: de la rim bskyed 'khor rnams la //
T02D2640:245a-43: mdo gdon sngags kyis 'khor rnams kun //
T02D2640:245a-44: sgrib sbyangs bdag 'drar gyur pa la //
T02D2640:245a-45: rgyal ba'i yum nyid bstan pa yi //
T02D2640:245a-46: dge ba bdag gis ci byas thams cad ni //
T02D2640:245a-47: sems can kun la byang chub phyir bsngo bas //
T02D2640:245a-48: bdag gzhan shes rab snying po thob par shog / rjes la sgyu ma'i blo yis langs //
T02D2640:245a-49: lha yi snang ba la gnas la //
T02D2640:245b-0: bya ba thams cad @245b rgyal bas spyad //
T02D2640:245b-1: ci spyad mthar phyin lam yin pas //
T02D2640:245b-2: sems gnyis phyin drug sems kyis bya //
T02D2640:245b-3: 'di don shes rab snying po ste //
T02D2640:245b-4: rmi lam sgyu mas bzlas brjod bya //
T02D2640:245b-5: dka' bas klu yi lag nas blangs //
T02D2640:245b-6: yun ring mdo rnams legs spyad la //
T02D2640:245b-7: rgyal yum 'di byas dge ba yis //
T02D2640:245b-8: 'gro bas shes rab yum thob shog / shes rab
T02D2640:245b-9: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i sgrub thabs
T02D2640:245b-10: slob dpon chen po klu sgrub snying pos mdzad pa
T02D2640:245b-12: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bee ro tsa na rakshi ta dang /
T02D2640:245b-13: bod kyi lo ts'a ba klan chung gis bsgyur ba'o //
